price: ߊ߯ߘߌ ߟߎ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߛߌߟߊߛߊ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߝߢߐ߫ ߞߊ߲-ߜߍߟߍ߲߫ ߝߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ߡߊ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߝߏߋ߯
arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā ʿādun fa-uh'likū birīḥin ṣarṣarin ʿātiyatin
